title: STAT+: Trump administration officials blocked FDA effort to fast-track review of psychedelic treatment
description: Trump administration officials vetoed the FDA's plan to fast-track the review of a psychedelic treatment for severe depression, STAT has learned.
content: Trump administration officials vetoed the FDA's plan to fast-track the review of a psychedelic treatment for severe depression, STAT has learned.
